body.name: Hilda Plush Hilda and Twig Plush Twig Stuffed Animal Doll
features: High quality: Plush are of high quality, exquisite workmanship, and the stitching is tight and not easy to crack. Especially it is not fading and easy to clean. It is best to wash by hand for better protection.
Use high-quality filled PP cotton, which is very soft and comfortable to the touch, and very friendly to dren's delicate skin. Harmless and non-polluting. The can hug to sleep at any time
Beautiful decorations: Hilda dolls are super soft and can be used as pillows, cushions or sleeping in your arms when you are tired. It can also be a good home decoration
Note: In order to better preserve items and save space, this plush product is packaged by vacuum compression, please tap and stretch it to restore its shape after receipt.
Size: 9 inches in size, dren can play well. It can accompany dren well and is easy to carry.
